LanguageData.RawWheat.label: wheat
LanguageData.RawWheat.description: Raw wheat consisting of straw and grain. Needs to be processed.
LanguageData.Straw.label: straw
LanguageData.Straw.description: Dried stalks of grain, used especially as fodder, harvested and compacted for storage. Straw is good animal feed, but inedible for humans.
